content.body: shu: re https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2646, did you know that TA.prototype.sort _also_ has a per-iteration detachedness check?

content.body: it doesn't even get you anything because you have to read all of the values out of the buffer before the loop anyway, since `compareFn` can write to the buffer
